class.name: OptionButton
class.brief_description: Button control that provides selectable options when pressed.
class.description: OptionButton is a type button that provides a selectable list of items when pressed. The item selected becomes the "current" item and is displayed as the button text.

method.name: add_icon_item
method.description: Adds an item, with a [code]texture[/code] icon, text [code]label[/code] and (optionally) [code]id[/code]. If no [code]id[/code] is passed, [code]id[/code] becomes the item index. New items are appended at the end.

method.name: add_item
method.description: Adds an item, with text [code]label[/code] and (optionally) [code]id[/code]. If no [code]id[/code] is passed, [code]id[/code] becomes the item index. New items are appended at the end.

method.name: add_separator
method.description: Adds a separator to the list of items. Separators help to group items. Separator also takes up an index and is appended at the end.

method.name: clear
method.description: Clear all the items in the [OptionButton].

method.name: get_item_count
method.description: Returns the amount of items in the OptionButton.

method.name: get_item_icon
method.description: Returns the icon of the item at index [code]idx[/code].

method.name: get_item_id
method.description: Returns the ID of the item at index [code]idx[/code].

method.name: get_item_index
method.description: Returns the index of the item with the given [code]id[/code].

method.name: get_item_text
method.description: Returns the text of the item at index [code]idx[/code].

method.name: get_popup
method.description: Returns the [PopupMenu] contained in this button.

method.name: select
method.description: Select an item by index and make it the current item.

method.name: set_item_icon
method.description: Sets the icon of an item at index [code]idx[/code].

method.name: set_item_id
method.description: Sets the ID of an item at index [code]idx[/code].

method.name: set_item_text
method.description: Sets the text of an item at index [code]idx[/code].

signal.name: item_focused
signal.description: Emitted the when user navigates to an item using the [code]ui_up[/code] or [code]ui_down[/code] actions. The index of the item selected is passed as argument.

signal.name: item_selected
signal.description: Emitted when the current item has been changed by the user. The index of the item selected is passed as argument.
